FuncDef:
The entropy-label enable command enables the LDP entropy label capability on the ingress of an LSP.
The undo entropy-label enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, no LDP entropy label is configured on the ingress of an LSP.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The entropy label is configured to address the severe load imbalance on a network. An LDP entropy label is configured using the entropy-label enable command on the ingress of an LSP, and an LDP tunnel with the entropy label capability enabled is negotiated using LDP. Then forwarding entries carry the flag supporting the entropy label capability to implement load balancing.
